definition.text: We've gone through the 3-point checklist and we are ready to go, so let's get on with it!

paragraphs.text: Run the Lightning Strike Task, and then run the Lightning Strike Live Trading Session to the right!

Once you run the session, the trading bot may have to wait up to 60 seconds for the last indicator to finish processing. Once it does, you will see the current date and a 0% progress notice under the Trading Process Instance, which will remain like that throughout the run.
